paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: RNA-seq data showed that the variant caused the whole-exon skipping of exon 5 in BRCA2.

functional_data.summary: The variant causes whole-exon skipping, leading to a frameshift variant.

variants.additional_notes: This variant was specifically mentioned as causing significant splicing changes.
key_quotes: RNA-seq data showed that the variant caused the whole-exon skipping of exon 5 in BRCA2.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was identified and extracted.
